verses.verse: Then came near <WH5066> <WH8799> the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> unto Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and unto the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

And they spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them at Shiloh <WH7887> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> us cities <WH5892> to dwell in <WH3427> <WH8800>, with the suburbs <WH4054> thereof for our cattle <WH929>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> out of their inheritance <WH5159>, at the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, these cities <WH5892> and their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> for the families <WH4940> of the K'hatis <WH6956>: and the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, which were of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, had by lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4294> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of SHim`on <WH8099>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Binyamin <WH1144>, thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892>.

And the rest <WH3498> <WH8737> of the children <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Efrayim <WH669>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, and out of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, ten <WH6235> cities <WH5892>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Naftali <WH5321>, and out of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519> in Bashan <WH1316>, thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892>.

The children <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847> by their families <WH4940> had out of the tribe <WH4294> of Re'uven <WH7205>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of Z'vulun <WH2074>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> by lot <WH1486> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> these cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> out of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and out of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095>, these cities <WH5892> which are here mentioned <WH7121> <WH8799> by name <WH8034>,

Which the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>, being of the families <WH4940> of the K'hatis <WH6956>, who were of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, had: for theirs was the first <WH7223> <WH8675> <WH7223> lot <WH1486>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them the city <WH7151> of Arba <WH704> <WH8677> <WH7153> the father <WH1> of Anak <WH6061>, which city is Hevron <WH2275>, in the hill <WH2022> country of Y'hudah <WH3063>, with the suburbs <WH4054> thereof round about <WH5439> it.
But the fields <WH7704> of the city <WH5892>, and the villages <WH2691> thereof, gave <WH5414> <WH8804> they to Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312> for his possession <WH272>.

Thus they gave <WH5414> <WH8804> to the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548> Hevron <WH2275> with her suburbs <WH4054>, to be a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; and Libnah <WH3841> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
And Jattir <WH3492> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Eshtemoa <WH851> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
And Holon <WH2473> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Debir <WH1688> with her suburbs <WH4054>,

And Ain <WH5871> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Juttah <WH3194> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Bethshemesh <WH1053> with her suburbs <WH4054>; nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> out of those two <WH8147> tribes <WH7626>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Binyamin <WH1144>, Giv`on <WH1391> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Geba <WH1387> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Anathoth <WH6068> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Almon <WH5960> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>, the Kohanim <WH3548>, were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955>, the L'vi'im <WH3881> which remained <WH3498> <WH8737> of the children <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955>, even they had the cities <WH5892> of their lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4294> of Efrayim <WH669>.

For they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them SH'khem <WH7927> with her suburbs <WH4054> in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, to be a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; and Gezer <WH1507> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
And Kibzaim <WH6911> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Bethhoron <WH1032> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, Eltekeh <WH514> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Gibbethon <WH1405> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Aijalon <WH357> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Gatrimmon <WH1667> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the half <WH4276> tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, Tanach <WH8590> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Gatrimmon <WH1667> with her suburbs <WH4054>; two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> were ten <WH6235> with their suburbs <WH4054> for the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955> that remained <WH3498> <WH8737>.

And unto the children <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>, of the families <WH4940> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, out of the other half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519> they gave Golan <WH1474> in Bashan <WH1316> with her suburbs <WH4054>, to be a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; and Beeshterah <WH1203> with her suburbs <WH4054>; two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, Kishon <WH7191> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Dabareh <WH1705> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Jarmuth <WH3412> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Engannim <WH5873> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, Mishal <WH4861> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Abdon <WH5658> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Helkath <WH2520> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Rehob <WH7340> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.

And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Naftali <WH5321>, Kedesh <WH6943> in the Galil <WH1551> with her suburbs <WH4054>, to be a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; and Hammothdor <WH2576> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Kartan <WH7178> with her suburbs <WH4054>; three <WH7969> cities <WH5892>.
All the cities <WH5892> of the Gershonites <WH1649> according to their families <WH4940> were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And unto the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847>, the rest <WH3498> <WH8737> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, out of the tribe <WH4294> of Z'vulun <WH2074>, Jokneam <WH3362> with her suburbs <WH4054>, and Kartah <WH7177> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Dimnah <WH1829> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Nahalal <WH5096> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.
And out of the tribe of Re'uven <WH7205>, Bezer <WH1221> with her suburbs, and YAHazah <WH3096> with her suburbs,
Kedemoth <WH6932> with her suburbs, and Mephaath <WH4158> with her suburbs; four <WH702> cities <WH5892>.

And out of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, Ramoth <WH7433> in Gil`ad <WH1568> with her suburbs <WH4054>, to be a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer <WH7523> <WH8802>; and Mahanaim <WH4266> with her suburbs <WH4054>,
Heshbon <WH2809> with her suburbs <WH4054>, Jazer <WH3270> with her suburbs <WH4054>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892> in all.

So all the cities <WH5892> for the children <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847> by their families <WH4940>, which were remaining <WH3498> <WH8737> of the families <WH4940> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, were by their lot <WH1486> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892>.

All the cities <WH5892> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> within <WH8432> the possession <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054>.
These cities <WH5892> were every one <WH5892> <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054> round about <WH5439> them: thus were all these cities <WH5892>.

And the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> all the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto their fathers <WH1>; and they possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> it, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> therein.

And the YY <WH3068> gave them rest <WH5117> <WH8799> round about <WH5439>, according to all that he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1>: and there stood <WH5975> <WH8804> not a man <WH376> of all their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them; the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> all their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> into their hand <WH3027>.

There failed <WH5307> <WH8804> not ought <WH1697> of any good <WH2896> thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; all came to pass <WH935> <WH8802>.
